welcome_screens.title:
Thanks for taking this survey! Together, maybe we'll be able to figure out this JavaScript thing once and for all! (yeah rightâ€¦)

Also, I know this survey seems long, but it's mostly the same questions repeated a bunch of times for different frameworks and libraries. Most people only take around *10 minutes* to fill it in.

thankyou_screens.title:
Thanks for completing this typeform
Now *create your own* â€” it's free, easy, & beautiful

fields.title:
*How this survey works

*For each technology, framework, or library mentioned, please pick one of the following options:

- ğŸ¤· You've never heard about it
- âœ”ï¸ You've heard about it and you *want* to learn it
- ğŸš« You've heard about it, but *don't want* to learn it (or are *unsure*)
- ğŸ‘ You've used it and *want* to use it again
- ğŸ‘ You've used it but *don't* *want* to use it again

Note: questions with a "\*" are required.
